summary.title: Summary
summary.paraph1: Hello! I'm Fuis18, a 20-year-old software systems engineer who enjoys creating and automating processes.
summary.paraph2: I've always enjoyed analyzing and understanding how things work, but being able to modify and share it is what has made me passionate.
summary.paraph3: I feel that it's more fun to learn by simulating and seeing how things change, than simply by theorizing.
summary.paraph4: I always look for the most standard or best way to do things, even if the learning curve is steep.
